A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Literally a copy and paste of previous star wars movies cut and stitched together with terrible attempts at humor. 

Super embarrassing how far this franchise has fallen and how horrible Hollywood has become that apparently they can not allow original scripts. Every movie in a series has to be a copy of the previous version. God forbid they take a risk and write something new or allow the plot to develop. 

Still waiting for iron Man 15. It will be the exact same story line as the first.
